summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1539, for the improvement of Thirty-eighth Avenue North, in the City of Seattle, from East Prospect Street to East Howe Street, by laying water mains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants, and other appurtenances necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said avenue, under Ordinance No. 16650 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
